data.trans_hint: Đừng đột ngột cúp máy tôi — chúng ta cần nói chuyện!
data.en_hint: Don't hang up on me—we need to talk!
data.content_game_1: Don't hang up on me—we need to talk!
data.answer_en_hint: Don't hang up on me—we need to talk!

data.trans: Thanh toán trước khi sử dụng dịch vụ
data.trans_hint: Phần lớn mọi người sử dụng điện thoại cước phí trả trước.
data.en_hint: Most people have phones on pay-as-you-go.
data.content_game_1: Most people have phones on pay-as-you-go.
data.answer_en_hint: Most people have phones on pay-as-you-go.

data.trans_hint: Anh ấy đã cúp máy trước khi tôi có thể giải thích.
data.en_hint: He rang off before I could explain.
data.content_game_1: He rang off before I could explain.
data.answer_en_hint: He rang off before I could explain.

data.trans: (+to sb) Liên hệ được với ai qua điện thoại
data.trans_hint: Tôi cố gọi cô ấy mấy lần nhưng không liên hệ được.
data.en_hint: I tried calling her several times but I couldn't get through.
data.content_game_1: I tried calling her several times but I couldn't get through.
data.answer_en_hint: I tried calling her several times but I couldn't get through.

data.trans: Làm ai ngắt kết nối (điện thoại)
data.trans_hint: Tín hiệu di động ở đây quá yếu đến mức nó liên tục ngắt kết nối khi tôi đang nghe điện thoại.
data.en_hint: The mobile signal here is so poor that it keeps cutting me off when I'm on the phone.
data.content_game_1: The mobile signal here is so poor that it keeps cutting me off when I'm on the phone.
data.answer_en_hint: The mobile signal here is so poor that it keeps cutting me off when I'm on the phone.

data.trans: Cho ai đó giữ máy (chờ máy)
data.trans_hint: Tớ phải để cậu giữ máy 1 lúc nhé vì shipper đang đợi dưới sảnh.
data.en_hint: I have to put you on hold for a second as the shipper is waiting down in the hall.
data.content_game_1: I have to put you on hold for a second as the shipper is waiting down in the hall.
data.answer_en_hint: I have to put you on hold for a second as the shipper is waiting down in the hall.

data.trans_hint: Bạn có thể nối máy cho tôi đến sếp của bạn được chứ?
data.en_hint: Can you put me through to your manager?
data.content_game_1: Can you put me through to your manager?
data.answer_en_hint: Can you put me through to your manager?

data.trans_hint: Con sẽ gọi lại cho mẹ ngay sau khi con đến trường nhé.
data.en_hint: I will ring you back as soon as I go to school, mom.
data.content_game_1: I will ring you back as soon as I go to school, mom.
data.answer_en_hint: I will ring you back as soon as I go to school, mom.

data.trans_hint: Tôi định nạp thêm tiền điện thoại để gọi cho bạn gái.
data.en_hint: I'm gonna top my phone up to make more calls with my girlfriend.
data.content_game_1: I'm gonna top my phone up to make more calls with my girlfriend.
data.answer_en_hint: I'm gonna top my phone up to make more calls with my girlfriend.
